name: Monaco GP
overview: Monaco GP is a port of a 1979 arcade racing game made by Sega. Players must avoid other cars  while making sure not to veer off of the track. Pressing up/down controls your speed. Pressing either Button 1 or Button 2 will execute a dodging maneuver. You start with four lives and will lose one each time you hit another vehicle or go outside the track boundaries.  The SG-1000 version has a difficulty select of one, two, or three other cars on the road.
